name: Quasar (itch) (Oscine Games)
description:
Navigate a diamond through a never ending vortex!

Your objective is simple; hold down the left mouse button, and use your mouse to guide the diamond through the blue and yellow rings, and avoid the red spike orbs.

-------------

This game was created during a 60 hour game jam, created by two developers from Oscine Games.
Justin Bettencourt
Shelby Dakin

-------------

If you enjoyed the game, buy us a coffee by hitting the "Support This Game" button above! Thank you!
